resources.string:
TasClock is android time manager for freelancers and other people, who wants to control work time.

 This program is free and open source. It is licensed under the GNU GPL v3. You can download the code of this program from: 
 https://github.com/Acvarium/TasClock/ 

Author: Vitalii Shmorgun 
E-mail: vshmorgun@yandex.ru
